description: This open sandwich brings together the earthiness of the mushrooms with the sharpness of tarragon
keywords: Sandwich,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Warm Open Sandwich with Mushroom, Shallots & Tarragon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat and fry the mushrooms, tarragon and shallots with the canola oil for 3 minutes while tossing.
Remove the mushrooms and shallots from the heat and serve on sourdough bread with salt and pepper to taste.
